subject: Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Jorge Posada and Andy Pettitte, who were playing with the Yankees’ Class A affiliate in Greensboro, N.C., in 1992, remembered when they first saw Derek Jeter, the 156-pound kid who was a first-round draft choice.
snippet: Jorge Posada and Andy Pettitte, who were playing with the Yankees’ Class A affiliate in Greensboro, N.C., in 1992, remembered when they first saw Derek Jeter, the 156-pound kid who was a first-round draft choice.
